name: Reflection (itch) (Nick Deksu)
description:
[Space] - Toggle flashlight

[E] - collect items/build boat

[LMB] - Shoot

This is thriller game, where you need to rebuild your boat and escape from the island haunted by Lovecraft inspired creatures.

Your only friends are your gun and flashlight. But beware, your flashlight attracts enemies and can lighten them so they invade our world.

Your survivalist sence telling you distance to the boat pieces, but they are kinda messy due to creatures around.

Be cautious. You can see enemies, objectives and all other dangerous stuff only after you find them with the flashlight. Everlasting rain creates holes in the ground that can damage you. Enemies can damage you only when they invade our world. You can shoot them only when they are here. Bullets are limited, use them wisely!

Music by Nikita Scarletov

Artwork by NDeksu and Nikita Scarletov

Gameplay by NDeksu
